pr_title: Add REST Test for Snapshot Clone API

timeline.message:
Add REST Test for Snapshot Clone API

This was still missing, we should at least have one test that verifies
that the REST API actually works.

timeline.bodyText: This is kind of meh, we technically only need the indices and indices options fields here for the HLRC client. But then I dug into it and found that we add all these redundant fields for other requests as well so I kept it consistent here for now. I have an idea on how to make this nicer that I'd put in a follow up (could just use a params entry here).
timeline.author: original-brownbear
